name: Paul Scouter
description:
am paul am here to seek for my true love. I am a fun, hardworking, well educated man looking for my better half. I am a recovering workaholic but am learning how to slow down and delegate. I am family oriented and enjoy backyard bbq’s with friends and family. I take exceptional care of my body and am very athletic without overly obsessing over it. Pretty much an adrenaline junkie, I enjoy going to the gym, running, swimming, zip-lining, scuba diving, surfing, tennis, fishing, hunting, riding my horses and golf. Through hard work, life and success have been good to me and it’s now time to share my world and good fortune with a smart, engaging, sweet, sexy woman. I’m looking for a long term relationship no FWBs or one nighters as that is not for me. A strong emotional connection is my aphrodisiac. I’m an excellent cook and you are welcome to find out for yourself
am looking for well-educated, well-mannered, intelligent, responsible, honest, reliable, cheerful, respectful and optimistic person. My goal is to find my life-partner, to create a happy family…
